Another NEW Service added to our portfolio: Miami, Florida. DirectAdmin Web Hosting.  =) 


<br>

✅Server Location - Miami, Florida
✅DirectAdmin Control Panel
✅Fully IPv6 compliant

✅Enterprise CloudLinux OS
✅Softaculous Auto-installer
✅1Gbps Port Speeds
✅NVMe disks in RAID
✅Jailed SSH Access Available
✅OpenLiteSpeed web server
✅Premium Email Relay included  - 100% email delivery
✅Python & Nodejs enabled.
✅Multiple PHP Versions: Yes
✅99.9% uptime guarantee
<br>

**Reseller & Web Hosting Plans**

* Flat 40% Recurring discount: coupon **Webmiami**

* Web Hosting: [Miami, Florida Web Hosting](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/packages/ssd-shared/?group_id=38 "Miami, Florida Web Hosting")

* Reseller Hosting: [Miami, Florida Reseller Hosting](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/packages/ssd-shared/?group_id=39 "Miami, Florida Reseller Hosting")

* Term: Valid both Monthly and Annual payment terms.

<br> 

**Generous CloudLinux Limits:**

200% CPU
2GB RAM
4096 IOPS
120MB/s Disk IO
70 Entry Processes
140 nproc


<br>

-------------------------------------------------

**Payment Methods**

PayPal payments are available. We recommend using Cards via Stripe Payments.
BTC / BCH / LTC etc. are supported.
All mentioned prices are recurring. 

<br>
For those having a card issued in India/billing address in India - Please order using INR currency only
INR payment methods: 
Razorpay(Cards, UPI, Netbanking, GooglePay etc), Stripe payments.

<br>

If any question you get can share here or can always create a ticket. :)
Thank You for reading this post!
